statements: SELECT * FROM UserProfile WHERE age < 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM UserProfile WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT username, email, age FROM UserProfile WHERE room_id = 101 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfile WHERE age >= 18 AND age <= 50 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, room_id, lighting_settings FROM UserProfile WHERE age > 30 AND room_id = 201;
SELECT * FROM UserProfile WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT username, email FROM UserProfile WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM UserProfile WHERE age < 40 AND room_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM UserProfile WHERE age >= 18 AND (room_id = 101 OR room_id = 102) ORDER BY age ASC, username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, lighting_settings FROM UserProfile WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT room_name, temperature FROM rooms WHERE lighting_intensity < 50;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM rooms ORDER BY lighting_intensity DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT room_name, temperature FROM rooms WHERE lighting_intensity > 50 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, date_of_birth FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT room_name, lighting_intensity, temperature FROM rooms WHERE temperature < 25 AND lighting_intensity BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY room_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-01-01' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT room_name, floor_number FROM rooms ORDER BY floor_number DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT setting_id, brightness, color FROM lighting_settings WHERE brightness > 50;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age < 25;
SELECT room_name, floor_number FROM rooms WHERE building_id = 1 AND floor_number > 5;
SELECT setting_id, brightness, color FROM lighting_settings WHERE brightness > 50 ORDER BY color ASC;
SELECT u.username, r.room_name, ls.brightness FROM users u JOIN lighting_settings ls ON u.user_id = ls.user_id JOIN rooms r ON ls.room_id = r.room_id
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT room_name, light_intensity FROM room_preferences ORDER BY room_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, room_id FROM user_room_mapping WHERE user_id = 2 AND room_id = 3;
SELECT MAX(brightness_level) AS max_brightness FROM lighting_history;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT room_id, room_name, light_intensity, temperature_control FROM room_preferences WHERE light_intensity > 50;
SELECT user_id, username, email, profile_image_url FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT room_id, room_name, light_intensity FROM room_preferences ORDER BY light_intensity DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM UserProfiles WHERE email = 'example@email.com'
SELECT room_name, room_type, light_intensity FROM Rooms ORDER BY light_intensity DESC
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM UserPreferences WHERE notification_enabled = TRUE
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM UserProfiles
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT room_name, room_type, light_intensity FROM Rooms WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM UserPreferences WHERE notification_enabled = TRUE;

SELECT u.first_name, r.room_name, ls.brightness FROM UserProfiles u JOIN UserRooms ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN Rooms r ON r.room_id = ur.room_id JOIN LightingSettings ls ON ls.room_id = r.room_id;
